attributes.action: not recognise President Ahmadinejad as the legitimate leader of Iran until there has been a new election in Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the tainted and suspect "results" of the recent Iranian election, and the widespread popular protests in Iran following the announcement of these results, the people of the world must respond to force the Iranian authorities to conduct free and transparent elections that will genuinely reflect the will of the Iranian people.

Since violence has been used against the peaceful protesters, it is clear that this is no longer a legitimate regime but a collection of tyrants engaged in clear attempt to override the democratic will of Iranians.
